title: Verify Subscribe Button Functionality
description: Ensure that the 'Subscribe' button functions correctly and leads to the subscription page or process.
steps:
1. Locate the 'Subscribe' button at the top of the page.
2. Click on the 'Subscribe' button.
3. Observe the navigation or any subscription process initiation.
expected_result: Clicking the 'Subscribe' button should navigate to the subscription page or initiate the subscription process.

title: Verify Discord Button Functionality
description: Ensure that the 'Discord' button functions correctly and leads to the Discord page or server invitation.
steps:
1. Locate the 'Discord' button at the top of the page.
2. Click on the 'Discord' button.
3. Observe the navigation to the Discord page or server invitation.
expected_result: Clicking the 'Discord' button should navigate to the Discord page or server invitation.

title: Verify Archive Button Functionality
description: Ensure that the 'Archive' button functions correctly and leads to the archive section.
steps:
1. Locate the 'Archive' button at the top of the page.
2. Click on the 'Archive' button.
3. Observe the navigation to the archive section.
expected_result: Clicking the 'Archive' button should navigate to the archive section.

title: Verify Light/Dark Mode Toggle
description: Ensure that the 'Light' button toggles the webpage theme between light and dark modes.
steps:
1. Locate the 'Light' button at the top right of the page.
2. Click on the 'Light' button.
3. Observe the change in webpage theme.
4. Click again to toggle back.
expected_result: Clicking the 'Light' button should toggle the webpage theme between light and dark modes.

title: Verify Search Functionality
description: Ensure that the search bar functions correctly and returns relevant search results.
steps:
1. Locate the search bar below the news date.
2. Enter a search term, e.g., 'AI'.
3. Press 'Enter' or click the search icon.
4. Observe the search results.
expected_result: The search bar should return relevant search results for the entered term.

title: Verify Audio Playback Functionality
description: Ensure that the 'Audio' button plays the audio summary of the article.
steps:
1. Locate the 'Audio' button next to the article title.
2. Click on the 'Audio' button.
3. Listen for audio playback.
expected_result: Clicking the 'Audio' button should play the audio summary of the article.

title: Verify NotebookLM Playback Functionality
description: Ensure that the 'NotebookLM' button plays the NotebookLM summary of the article.
steps:
1. Locate the 'NotebookLM' button next to the article title.
2. Click on the 'NotebookLM' button.
3. Listen for NotebookLM playback.
expected_result: Clicking the 'NotebookLM' button should play the NotebookLM summary of the article.

title: Verify Article Links Functionality
description: Ensure that the links 'Original Article' and 'HN Discussion' navigate to their respective pages.
steps:
1. Locate the 'Original Article' link below the article title.
2. Click on the 'Original Article' link.
3. Observe the navigation to the original article.
4. Repeat steps 1-3 for the 'HN Discussion' link.
expected_result: Clicking the 'Original Article' link should navigate to the original article, and clicking the 'HN Discussion' link should navigate to the discussion page.

title: Verify Content Accuracy
description: Ensure that the article content is accurate and consistent with the title and summary.
steps:
1. Read the article title and summary.
2. Compare the content in 'Article Summary' and 'Discussion Highlights' sections.
3. Verify the content for accuracy and consistency.
expected_result: The article content should be accurate and consistent with the title and summary.

title: Verify Visual Layout and Responsiveness
description: Ensure that the webpage layout is visually appealing and responsive across different screen sizes.
steps:
1. Open the webpage on a desktop browser.
2. Resize the browser window to different sizes.
3. Observe the layout and responsiveness.
4. Repeat steps 1-3 on a mobile device.
expected_result: The webpage layout should be visually appealing and responsive across different screen sizes.
